org.daisy.pipeline.client.http

Class WS

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.pipeline.client.http.WS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WSInterface

    public class WS
extends Object
implements WSInterface
    Methods for communicating with the Pipeline 2 API.
    See Also:
    http://code.google.com/p/daisy-pipeline/wiki/WebServiceAPI

      • setShutDownKey

        public void setShutDownKey(String shutDownKey)
        Set the key used when invoking /admin/halt to shut down the engine. Defaults to the first line if the "dp2key.txt" file in the systems temporary directory.
        Specified by:
        setShutDownKey in interface WSInterface
        Parameters:
        shutDownKey - the shutdown key to use
